name: Mystery Trackers: Four Aces Collector's Edition
name_original: Mystery Trackers: Four Aces Collector's Edition
description:
Mystery Trackers: Four Aces Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It came out on 11-10-2012. It was published by Big Fish Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Mystery Trackers: Four Aces Collector's Edition on PC.
